#summary rules to live by

= Introduction =

This doc aims to set the expectations of the CIF community; it's not a set of restrictions but a set of expectations enabling the sharing of good ideas.

= Guidelines =

 # NO Sales Pitches for non-open source, freely available software.
 # Vendors ARE more than welcome, ultimately we want integration, this is how we train them
 # Vendors SHALL NOT compare their products to another in this forum (you have a website; use that)
 # Think before you post; if you annoy a moderator; they might kick you
 # we reserve the right to kick anyone off the list for violating any of these guidelines
